name: Nomad Camp
description: A temporary nomad camp follows seasonal resources and trade routes, offering unique cultural experiences and specialized goods. The mobile nature makes it difficult to track or control, while the traditional knowledge and skills can be valuable to outsiders.
atmosphere: Traditional music and livestock movement create vibrant daily life sounds. Air carries campfires, traditional foods, and ancient knowledge scent. Constant activity of daily life and seasonal movement. Traditional structures and tents create cultural richness. Mobile nature creates freedom and adaptability sense. Temporary settlement creates impermanence and constant movement feeling.
